reviews.text:
Sooo glad I stumbled on this gem! I went today 07/30/2025 @ 2:40 pm and the young man was very kind and explained the pizza specials etc.

They have daily lunch specials and specials.

Lots of parking
Easy to find
Daily specials
Lots of places to sit
Large menu to please the pickiest eaters
Coke products

From appetizers, pizza, pasta, calzones, pasta, sandwiches, dessert and coke products.

Its New York style pizza and it was soooooo good! I took it to go and my husband and I loved it that were going back.

The pizza is sooo tasty, the sauce is so good the specials are great!

Great job Sergios everything was soo good!! You have definitely made two fans today.

Genuinely the best slices I have had in Utah and the prices are great for what you‚Äôre getting. I‚Äôve only ever had positive experiences with the staff who are all very nice. The only downside about this place is it‚Äôs pretty far from where I live but make a point to go anytime I‚Äôm in the area.

You want to be in New York but can‚Äôt quite get there‚Ä¶ Come and have your pizza slice here! One slice and you are stuffed! Fast and easy and much healthier option for pizza lovers!

I come here with my kids all the time now after we found it!

The sign is a bit hidden into the background but it‚Äôs well worth a visit! Love supporting entrepreneurs!
After having driven my multiple times I finally stopped today!!! I had the 2 slice and drink Combo (8$) I chose The Grandmas slice!! Goodness the crust is amazing and the sauce is just amazing!!

I always get this pizza at wheelers Market and it is delicious. How ever today was the first time I ordered it and got it delivered. Huge disappointment. The amount of cheese on this pizza blew my mind. And it was sooo soggy I couldn't believe it. Will probably only eat this pizza at the farmers market from now on.

recentReviews.text: Pizza was drenched in grease, I wish i took a picture.

The only better pizza place than this that I've found, is outside of Utah!!!! They have gone to NYC and Italy to develop their recipe.
The service and kindness of the staff is unmatched.  Prices are shockingly low for the lunch specials.  I get the cheese  pizza and drink for $6 love it every time.   Sergio's, you have a ongoing customer!!!!! Spread the word - phenomenal pizza!
We love this place! Best pizza, seriously amazing. So much good cheese.
Very solid pizza. Best NY pizza I‚Äôve ever had? Probably not. But solid, legitimately good.

update 8/17/25

I‚Äôm really happy to share that on my most recent visit, the pizzas are back to tasting the way they did when I first fell in love with this place! The balance of cheese, sauce, and toppings is now spot on, and every bite feels just right. It‚Äôs clear the team has worked hard to make sure the ratios are perfect across all of their pizzas, and it really shows in the quality. I‚Äôm so glad to see things back on track and will definitely be coming back again and again!

I always get this pizza at wheelers Market and it is delicious. How ever today was the first time I ordered it and got it delivered. Huge disappointment. The amount of cheese on this pizza blew my mind. And it was sooo soggy I couldn't believe it. Will probably only eat this pizza at the farmers market from now on.

detailedReviews.text: Pizza was drenched in grease, I wish i took a picture.

The service and kindness of the staff is unmatched.  Prices are shockingly low for the lunch specials.  I get the cheese  pizza and drink for $6 love it every time.   Sergio's, you have a ongoing customer!!!!! Spread the word - phenomenal pizza!

detailedReviews.text: We love this place! Best pizza, seriously amazing. So much good cheese.

detailedReviews.author: Cameron Moon
detailedReviews.text: Very solid pizza. Best NY pizza I‚Äôve ever had? Probably not. But solid, legitimately good.

detailedReviews.author: Samuel ‚ÄúSamDaman904‚Äù Anscher
detailedReviews.text:
update 8/17/25

I‚Äôm really happy to share that on my most recent visit, the pizzas are back to tasting the way they did when I first fell in love with this place! The balance of cheese, sauce, and toppings is now spot on, and every bite feels just right. detailedReviews.author: james n
detailedReviews.text: I always get this pizza at wheelers Market and it is delicious. How ever today was the first time I ordered it and got it delivered. Huge disappointment. The amount of cheese on this pizza blew my mind. And it was sooo soggy I couldn't believe it. Will probably only eat this pizza at the farmers market from now on.

detailedReviews.author: Xochitl Velasco
detailedReviews.text:

detailedReviews.author: Joe Clark
detailedReviews.text: Genuinely the best slices I have had in Utah and the prices are great for what you‚Äôre getting. I‚Äôve only ever had positive experiences with the staff who are all very nice. The only downside about this place is it‚Äôs pretty far from where I live but make a point to go anytime I‚Äôm in the area.

detailedReviews.author: kumenchi
detailedReviews.text: The food here is on point!  Reminds me of all the pizzerias in NY i used to visit.  The Staff is great and welcoming.  This is a must visit!

detailedReviews.author: Jesse Senteno
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is really good. Probably the best crust I've had yet. I'm a pizza freak. The food truck was awesome.  I went to the store today and I noticed the young manager openly scorning the staff. He seemed really angry over small issues.  Not very professional.  Pizza was still killer though. Just need a better manager or he could calm down a little.  Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Rob Olsen
detailedReviews.text: Best NY Style pizza in Utah üòä

detailedReviews.author: Jonathan Aburto
detailedReviews.text: After having driven my multiple times I finally stopped today!!! I had the 2 slice and drink Combo (8$) I chose The Grandmas slice!! Goodness the crust is amazing and the sauce is just amazing!!

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Wilkins
detailedReviews.text: Really good quality. Nice place too. Staff was very helpful as well and wanted to make sure I was taken care of.

detailedReviews.author: Makaya Legocki
detailedReviews.text: Really disappointed with the pizza I‚Äôve received from Sergio‚Äôs, The pizza consist of more oil than the actual pizza leaving the breading soaked in oil. I have thrown up after eating two slices and as someone who loves pizza this was really disappointing.

detailedReviews.author: Toni Velarde
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is sooooo good!  Love it!!!

detailedReviews.author: Corban Justet
detailedReviews.text:
This is the best commercial authentic New York Style Italian food I have ever had!

That also said from one of my best friends who is half Italian whom I came here with, and has been to New York and eaten this kind of excellent food before.

We ordered a Buffalo Mozz pie, Manicott‚Äô, chicken cutlets with fresh mozz and sauce, and cannoli for dessert, all were phenomenal! Great food, excellent service, friendly staff, and a positive atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: Jai Ganesh
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was too oily. The taste was just okay.

detailedReviews.author: David Peterson
detailedReviews.text: Stopped in because we live close. We had fairly high expectations based on word of mouth and online reviews. Well, what a major disappointment. First, the person who took our order was surly, unfriendly and short with us. We ordered a couple of slices and the food was pretty poor. The crust was wet and mushy, far from what we wanted. The flavor was bland and uninteresting. Our whole experience was bad. We wont return.

detailedReviews.author: James Turnbull
detailedReviews.text: Had three pizzas: Veggie Pie, Chic/Broc/Tom Pie, and Margarita Pie. The Margarita Pie was fine--I did like the crust well enough on all three--but the other two pizzas were very bland. I don't know if they're supposed to have an olive oil base or what it is, but they basically tasted solely like ingredients with melted cheese on them; virtually no flavor otherwise. So, that's not my style and I won't be purchasing from there again, especially for $28+ per pizza (more than the online menu lists); for that price, I want food that will wow me, and this wasn't it for me.

detailedReviews.author: Nathalie Herrey
detailedReviews.text:
You want to be in New York but can‚Äôt quite get there‚Ä¶ Come and have your pizza slice here! One slice and you are stuffed! Fast and easy and much healthier option for pizza lovers!

I come here with my kids all the time now after we found it!

The sign is a bit hidden into the background but it‚Äôs well worth a visit! Love supporting entrepreneurs!

detailedReviews.author: L H
detailedReviews.text:
0 out of 10. Will not eat here again.
Last year or so I had a co worker talking about how good this place is.

My lady and I wanted to go someplace new, so we finally checked it out.

The pizza looked like it had been sitting out all day. The cooked slices I picked where placed in the the oven to reheat before serving. Both of my slices had burnt bottoms.

I'm actually surprised they served it without flinching, so it must be common practice to serve reheated expired looking food there. I wouldn't recommend this pizza to anybody.

detailedReviews.author: Sucram Myrick
detailedReviews.text: Enjoyed the food and the service even with haveing an issue it was resolved fast with not thought thank you for the first time :)

detailedReviews.author: Scott Jonas
detailedReviews.text: Best NY style pies around. Definitely east coast inspired. When you walk in and the glassed counter is full of about 12 pizzas to choose from by the slice. AWESOME.

detailedReviews.author: Hayden Boulter
detailedReviews.text: Great food great pizza

detailedReviews.author: CB 3
detailedReviews.text: Penne Ala vodka pasta was amazing! I was surprised to have pasta as flavorful as that at a pizza spot. An order can be split between 2 and even slightly more than needed if you both ordered a slice to go with it. The Sicilian, the Grandma, and the White slices were very good! The veggie is stacked. I would request less toppings too much broccoli and mushrooms. I will definitely be back, and it's a little out of my way where I live, but good enough for repeat business from me, for sure.

detailedReviews.author: Keith Keller
detailedReviews.text: Ordered the Sergios Super Special. Had some order issues but they took care of it and the food was awesome. Pizza, Zitti, garlic knots, and meatball sub. Definitely recomend going here.

detailedReviews.author: Remington Wickham
detailedReviews.text: An exceptional experience with attentive staff. I‚Äôm grateful for all of hard work. The food is spectacular!

detailedReviews.author: Hyrum Oliphant
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was kinda mid. The white creamy one was good. The crust is kinda weird. They accidentally burnt some of our pieces and replaced them for free, which was very nice.

detailedReviews.author: Taylor Turner
detailedReviews.text: Great place!

detailedReviews.author: Makayla Cammack
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was great, but their tiramisu was even better. Excited that I tried Sergio‚Äôs and now can make them a regular part of my lunch rotation :)

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Fry
detailedReviews.text: üî•üî•üî•üî•üî•üî•

detailedReviews.author: Ally Zundel
detailedReviews.text: Food truck guy is rude.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Sandoval
detailedReviews.text:
Not really sure how it should be rated... Food I'd give it 4 stars.  I've been there twice in the past week. I live nearby and saw the banner months before the actual opening of the restaurant. I kept it in mind and finally decided to try it. I called and placed an order for a large two topping pizza and they mentioned it would be 15-20 minutes which was not a problem.

We decided to try the other options on the menu last night and went in around 5:15. It started picking up shortly after we ordered. We ordered the chicken Parm with spaghetti and a hero (sandwich) with sausage and peppers, in addition to two garlic knots. I was unaware that they were sold in a set of three. After roughly 45 minutes I asked the cashier if there was any update on our food. After a few minutes she found the salad. Checked all the bags on top of the oven and in the back. At this point another individual began helping with the search. After  several minutes they found the bag with food on top of the oven, which then made me wonder how long it had been done but not called the name on the order. They then opened to check if everything was there and they forgot the garlic knots. Now remember how I ordered two, the second individual then said they were giving us six to make up for the inconvenience. Which is what I paid for to begin with.

All in all, the food was good. It was fully staffed almost to a fault because there were probably over 10 workers behind the counter and were having to constantly evade collisions. If I ever return to eat there it would have to be calling ahead for a pizza so it is ready when picking up. But $23 for a large two topping pizza is pretty pricey (additional $3 per topping) even compared to Marco's. Maybe after a few more months they will work out the kinks.

detailedReviews.author: J
detailedReviews.text: The staff were friendly and helpful and the food was prepared quickly for a to go order. It was a large amount of food for the cost so I had several meals out of one order. I had the chicken parmesan and it was absolutely delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Wesley Walsman
detailedReviews.text: Best New York style Pizza in Utah!

detailedReviews.author: ben pugmire
detailedReviews.text: I love New York Pizza and Utah has very limited options, so I was excited to try it, but oh man was I disappointed. First off, they did not tell us about a special they had with ordering two pizzas, no big deal but not a great start. Pizza was bland and had absolutely 0 flavor, barely any toppings. would not try again

detailedReviews.author: James Culbreath (Weasy)
detailedReviews.text: If they make a Dasher wait, they'll give the Dasher a slice of üçï.

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Munson
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza in the area

detailedReviews.author: Alondra B. (Alondra)
detailedReviews.text: The customer service messed it up for me. Pizza was soggy and cold.

detailedReviews.author: Spencer Duncan
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, great cost. Enjoyed my grandma (Long Island-style) slice. Fresh sauce, crisp crust, perfectly ‚Äújust there‚Äù (though there are loads of varieties to choose from). Pleasant, fast service at this family-run restaurant. Will return! Good dessert selection too‚Äî we had cannoli.

detailedReviews.author: Jason Kelly
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve been to Sergio‚Äòs several times. This is the first time I reviewed. I want to make it clear, I do recommend this place. Having said that, it feels like something has changed a little bit. The pizza is a little bit thicker, and a little bit cheesier than it has been in the past.  This is still a great place. The staff is great. Classic pizza shop decor. Clean. Great place to get a slice or feed the entire family.

detailedReviews.author: Tyrel Parkinson
detailedReviews.text: Awesome pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Lucas Pearce
detailedReviews.text: Their pizza truck on the UofU campus is amazing. Was starving today and they gave me a extra slice for free. 10/10

detailedReviews.author: Jamie Wilcox
detailedReviews.text: Did a delivery. Spaghetti and meatballs were bland and meatballs were pink in the middle. Caesar salad was nothing but croutons with a few pieces of shredded romaine. Garlic bread tasted like I snorted a crushed clove of garlic. Very overpowering.

detailedReviews.author: ScottSquidkid
detailedReviews.text: The food was amazing, you don‚Äôt feel like you are bloated after eating, you feel filled but not like you will explode. The food was great, the chicken bacon ranch, barbecue chicken, and garlic knots were amazing, especially with the homemade oil they made. The service was awesome, our food came pretty quick.

detailedReviews.author: Joe
detailedReviews.text: As a NY Italian, I will gladly say that Sergio's is the best pizza in the state of Utah. If you want actual NY style pizza come here

detailedReviews.author: Jay
detailedReviews.text: Really good pizza. Great service. Nice menu. Pizza by the slice or the whole pie.

detailedReviews.author: Ty Young
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is honestly excellent. One of the best in utah. But they hire teenagers who are consistently careless and get your order wrong half the time. Just be specific on the phone and ask for them to read it back and you should be fine.

detailedReviews.author: Tai Scholes (Korundur)
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is pretty bland and flavorless, heavily relies on the salt in the meat for flavor, so if you're getting pizza, get one with meat. The most disappointing white pizza I've ever had, had to season myself with the one salt shaker they had for the whole restaurant. Garlic knots were tough and mediocre, cheese sticks were fine but overpriced. Restaurant was nice and service was good, but get better pizza for your money somewhere else.

detailedReviews.author: Deet
detailedReviews.text:
I've been here about 5 times now so I feel this is an accurate review:
I see their potential so I keep coming back since I work near here. The pizza is pretty good, genuinely. The service is what needs help. The guy running this place is trying really hard you can tell, but the staff under him are so low-effort. Anytime I walk in and it's not the owner I have to get the attention of the first one to make eye contact with me, it's like they're all scared to talk to someone and make eyes at each other instead.
Langauge barriers are a massive issue between the workers, English is 2nd and 3rd for some of them. I've witnessed that the english language is the only language a chunk of them share so communicating between one another seems impossible since it's broken and their accents are so different. I've seen several times that they use Google translate with one another.

This translates into miscommunications about food orders, and more importantly, food allergy requirements. I cannot express how that's extremely dangerous. I've witnessed first hand them mess this up with a customer and it caused that persons food to be so delayed, they had to leave because their lunch break was over.  I've seen an allergy mixup luckily be caught before the customer ate, and her extreme frustration at them about it. I hope she's left a review as well.

Personally today I'm finally writing a review because I had a "final straw."
I decided to try a salad and regret it. I asked the kid running the til how big the small vs large salads are, and he said "BLT salad?" And I said "no, like size, what sizes?" "We do small or large." "Ok but how big are they?" "You want small or large BLT salad?"
I just had to shake my head and tell him I want a small Greek salad with chicken.
It took them WAY too long to make it for me, and when they finally did they were asking "to go?" And I said "no I can eat it here" and they didn't understand what I said, so I said "here. I will eat here." And the poor girl still wasn't understanding. So I said "sure, to-go, that's fine." And she disappeared into the back and took another 4 minutes to bring me my salad all wrapped up.
Total was $15 and it's abysmal. It was stacked mostly with thick cut tomatoes.The chicken is good, that's fine, it tastes great, but the price is wild for what I got.
Id have gotten more for less at Harmon's salad bar just up the street.

The catalyst of my final straw isn't me though, it's the couple that came in right after me. They'd called ahead of time to ask if they do cauliflower crust, and were told yes. They ordered right after me, and I heard them order, and these guys hand the poor girl a cheese pizza with cauliflower on it. She explained to them again what she needed, and it turned into the 2 workers whispering to each other and asking her again what she needed. They pulled out their phones to Google translate and look up literal pictures for what she was talking about. They then told her they can't do that, but by now had wasted about 15 minutes of her time. They then struggled to find out how to refund her.

They need to work on communication. Desperately.

detailedReviews.author: Levi Chatterley
detailedReviews.text: Manicotti was perfect. Garlic knots at a more than reasonable price. Too much food to finish for the price. Great experience and will definitely be returning/ telling all the homiesüôåüèºüî•

detailedReviews.author: Casey Bowman
detailedReviews.text:
Sergio's pizza a slice above the rest!
The restaurant was Clean and the staff was super friendly! I'll be ordering from this place more often!

detailedReviews.author: Karol Tapias
detailedReviews.text: It's the best pizza place in South Jordan! There are so many delicious options to choose from. What I really love about this place, though, is the attention and service. Seth was incredibly helpful and kind‚Äîyou‚Äôre amazing! Thank you for existing,

detailedReviews.author: Patricia Vel√°squez Betancourt
detailedReviews.text: El peor servicio que he tenido jam√°s,  me trajeron a la mesa dos veces el pedido equivocado, cansada de esperar ped√≠ que por favor me reintegraran el dinero, se comprometieron a hacerlo y nunca sucedi√≥, me qued√© sin comida y sin dinero.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Werner
detailedReviews.text: Since moving to Utah 4 years ago I have been searching for authentic NY pizza. Today, my good people, that search has  ended.

detailedReviews.author: Angel Pino
detailedReviews.text: Excelente atencion ni hablar de las pizzas buenisimas

detailedReviews.author: Philip Powley
detailedReviews.text: Amazing place best New York Pizza in town

detailedReviews.author: Austin Wilke
detailedReviews.text: This place is a gem! Have been looking for a GOOD chicken parm sandwich around the valley for a while and this place has them! GREAT pizza, GREAT subs, GREAT garlic knots, everything is so good. Got to chat with the two owners for a bit this morning, also GREAT people. I will returning‚Ä¶ frequently..

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Guzman
detailedReviews.text: My family‚Äôs go-to pizza place! Delicious food - love their chicken bacon ranch pizza and all of their salads, and amazing service. So happy to have found Sergio‚Äôs!

detailedReviews.author: Rosie Jones
detailedReviews.text:
I got two cheese slices and a drink for $6, and the slices are HUGE. But the cheese is too chewy, the sauce isn‚Äôt flavorful enough, and the crust was too yeasty.
It‚Äôs okay overall, but I‚Äôve had pizza in New York, and this ain‚Äôt it.

detailedReviews.author: Jodi Williams
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza in Utah and great prices. I will make this family night every night. Plus, they offer delivery and catering

detailedReviews.author: Alison Lee
detailedReviews.text: We travel from Utah County to come have this pizza frequently! I grew up in NY and miss their pizza. There are few places that make a good NY slice around Utah, and this is of the top! I prefer just the classic cheese! Never disappoints! The service is always great and helpful! I called ahead as I was trying to order on Uber Eats first, and the employee on the phone talked me through it and was super helpful. My only wish is that they open a location in Utah County!! We will continue to make the drive until then!

detailedReviews.author: Cole Williams
detailedReviews.text: unbelievable food unbelievable prices

detailedReviews.author: Jeffrey Christensen
detailedReviews.text: Best New York pizzas/lunch pizza specials in the valley! You get two giant slices and drink for 8$ their desserts are all amazing as well! Garlic knots never disappoint either!

detailedReviews.author: Tyson Romero
detailedReviews.text: Ordered through Uber eats. There's a reason it's bogo free. Complete garbage. Taste like little Caesars crust with too much cheese to hide the lack luster sauce. Honestly, I will never order here again

detailedReviews.author: Al H.
detailedReviews.text: New York City quality pizza in South Jordan. Amazing! üçï

detailedReviews.author: Braxton Boyt
detailedReviews.text: Had high expectations for this place considering the reviews but my pizza was nothing but cheese which tasted like string cheese and the pizza wasn‚Äôt even cut. Actually would‚Äôve rather of had a digiorno pizza. Disappointed

detailedReviews.author: Xander Lennox
detailedReviews.text:
Their pizza tastes amazing. My only complaint is the dozen times I‚Äôve ordered pizza from them it arrives and the toppings and cheese are all run off in the corner of the box. This happens EVERYTIME and I‚Äôd be surprised every driver happens to be mishandling the food. It‚Äôs like it‚Äôs placed on a slanted stand in the box waiting for the driver to pick it up and due to it being so hot it just runs off of the pizza and you end up digging cheese and toppings out of the corner and edge of the box.

Maybe research what‚Äôs going on with your deliveries $40 pizza that seems like it was carried in a backpack vertical the whole way seems like a simple remedy is in place.

detailedReviews.author: J M
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza and pasta in the whole of South Jordan, West Jordan, Herriman, and Riverton area. Everything I‚Äôve ever had there is so delicious and fresh. This is my go to pizza place now.

detailedReviews.author: James Riggs
detailedReviews.text: This place is the best it‚Äôs proper NY pizza in a state plagued by bland and uninspired food. Thank you guys for bringing real NY pizza here it really does taste like home.

detailedReviews.author: Tammy Evans
detailedReviews.text: This was our first visit. The meat lovers pizza was good. They put a lot of ingredients on their pizza. Almost too much. They could reduce the amount of toppings and cheese and reduce the price, and it would still be good. We'll ask them to go light on the cheese next time. Will try it again in the future.

detailedReviews.author: Clayton Carter
detailedReviews.text: Honestly this was the worst pizza I‚Äôve ever eaten in Utah, and quite possibly ever. The crust was tasteless (I think they forgot salt) and too bready. The sauce was likely from a can and just gross. Way too much cheese, but when it‚Äôs awful cheap processed cheese that is NOT a good thing. If the pizza was ever good here (and, based on past reviews, I believe it was) those days are over. Offering a BOGO deal on delivery apps won‚Äôt save this place either. Don‚Äôt fall for them trying to give a bad product away - when it‚Äôs so bad you throw the second pizza out, the savings don‚Äôt matter. I grew up back East and this is not authentic NY pizza. Pizza from the worst 24-hour slice shop in the most touristy part of the city is 100x better than the pizza sold here. I sincerely hope the owners will read this review and address the serious issues they have in the kitchen ASAP.

detailedReviews.author: Mindy Olsen
detailedReviews.text: Best New York style pizza I have found yet in Utah!!

detailedReviews.author: Eugene Vinson
detailedReviews.text: The food is always amazing. Every time I come here the employees are always friendly. They greet you with smiles it‚Äôs a very pleasant place to eat with your family your grandkids, the employees here always go out of their way to take care of their customers I would highly recommend it to anybody who loves Pizza. They have so many different varieties of pizza. Yum Yum.

detailedReviews.author: Kimberly Reese
detailedReviews.text: Called in a dinner order for pick up this evening. I ordered a plain pie, penne vodka, half dozen garlic knots and zeppolies. The penne vodka was hands down the best we have had in Utah. Pizza and zeppolies were also top notch. Unfortunately there were 2 side salads instead of garlic knots in one of the bags so we could not try those.

detailedReviews.author: Nate Powley
detailedReviews.text:
Wow is all I can say, this place is simply unbelievably good. They guy who makes this stuff looks like he is straight from Italy itself

The pizza crust is cooked to perfection with the cheese so delicately laying atop, sauce melding the bread and cheese together, it‚Äôs like a symphony of food

I cannot recommend this place enough

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.1/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the authentic New York style pizza, with a perfect balance of cheese, sauce, and toppings, reminiscent of NYC and Italy - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The exceptional service and kindness of the staff consistently enhance the dining experience - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The daily lunch specials offer great value, with options like the cheese pizza and drink combo for just $6 - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues related to greasy, soggy, and bland pizza - review management can address this concern
Poor customer service experiences, including unfriendly staff and order inaccuracies - social media marketing can improve this area
Long wait times and order mishandling - Boostly marketing services can improve this

positive.author: Charity Coop
positive.text:
The only better pizza place than this that I've found, is outside of Utah!!!! They have gone to NYC and Italy to develop their recipe.
The service and kindness of the staff is unmatched.  Prices are shockingly low for the lunch specials.  I get the cheese  pizza and drink for $6 love it every time.   Sergio's, you have a ongoing customer!!!!! Spread the word - phenomenal pizza!

positive.author: Taylor Westergard
positive.text: We love this place! Best pizza, seriously amazing. So much good cheese.

positive.author: Cameron Moon
positive.text: Very solid pizza. Best NY pizza I‚Äôve ever had? Probably not. But solid, legitimately good.

neutral.author: james n
neutral.text: I always get this pizza at wheelers Market and it is delicious. How ever today was the first time I ordered it and got it delivered. Huge disappointment. The amount of cheese on this pizza blew my mind. And it was sooo soggy I couldn't believe it. Will probably only eat this pizza at the farmers market from now on.

neutral.author: Jai Ganesh
neutral.text: The pizza was too oily. The taste was just okay.

neutral.author: Hyrum Oliphant
neutral.text: The pizza was kinda mid. The white creamy one was good. The crust is kinda weird. They accidentally burnt some of our pieces and replaced them for free, which was very nice.

negative.author: Jordan Parrish
negative.text: Pizza was drenched in grease, I wish i took a picture.

negative.author: Makaya Legocki
negative.text: Really disappointed with the pizza I‚Äôve received from Sergio‚Äôs, The pizza consist of more oil than the actual pizza leaving the breading soaked in oil. I have thrown up after eating two slices and as someone who loves pizza this was really disappointing.

negative.author: David Peterson
negative.text: Stopped in because we live close. We had fairly high expectations based on word of mouth and online reviews. Well, what a major disappointment. First, the person who took our order was surly, unfriendly and short with us. We ordered a couple of slices and the food was pretty poor. The crust was wet and mushy, far from what we wanted. The flavor was bland and uninteresting. Our whole experience was bad. We wont return.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
